TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceHostFactory extends System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactoryBase

summary.span: 在 Managed 裝載環境中提供 執行個體的處理站，在這個環境中會動態建立主機執行個體以回應傳入訊息。

span.span: Factory that provides instances of in managed hosting environments where the host instance is created dynamically in response to incoming messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援動態啟動的 Managed 裝載環境包括網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 和 Windows Process Activation Service (WAS)。The managed hosting environments that support dynamic activation are Internet Information Services (IIS) and Windows Process Activation Service (WAS). 如果您已實作了 的自訂衍生，建議您一併實作衍生自 類別的處理站。If you have implemented a custom derivative of , consider also implementing a factory that derives from the class. 反之，如果您已實作了 的自訂衍生，建議您一併實作直接從 衍生您處理站的處理站。If you have implemented a custom derivative of instead, then consider also implementing a factory that derives your factory from directly. ## Examples 這個範例會說明如何使用 類別：This examples show how to use the class: [!code-csharp[ServiceHostFactory#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicehostfactory/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[ServiceHostFactory#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicehostfactory/vb/program.vb#0)]
